title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Teaching with Historic Places
body: Teaching with Historic Places         Thor's Hammer and the Temple of Osiris NPS  When lighted by the morning sun the gorgeous chasm is an immense bowl of lace and filigree work in stone, colored with the white of frost and the pinks of glowing embers. To those who have not forgotten the story books of childhood it suggests a playground for fairies. Follow this link to lesson plans to assist in "Teaching with Historic Places"
